casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

July 17, 2007

[Cite as 07/17/2007 Case Announcements, 2007-Ohio-3616.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-1189. State v. Lather.

Sandusky App. No. S-03-008, 2007-Ohio-2399. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay and appeal bond,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.

Moyer, C.J., and O’Connor, J., dissent.
